Nneka Abulokwe, OBE ( / ŋneka ˈabuːlɔːkwei / ) bụ onye Naijiria si Britain  amaara maka ọrụ ya dịka onye ochụnta ego banyere ọrụ nchịkwa dijitalụ
Ọ bụ onye gụzọbere na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke MicroMax Consulting, yana otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara Afro-Caribbean nọ na UK sonyere na kọmitii nke nzukọ dijitalụ kachasị elu
Na 2019, onye isi ya bụ Queen Elizabeth II kwanyeere ya ugwu dịka onye ọrụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain (Officer of the British Empire (OBE)) maka ọrụ ya banyere azụmahia.
A mụrụ ya na London
Nna nna ya si Naijiria na nne ya si Jamaica ma o tolitere n'obodo Port Harcourt, Nigeria
Na 1991, o nwetara nzere bachelọ na mmuta ihe mere eme site na Mahadum Port Harcourt
O mechara nweta nzere mastas na Mahadum London ya na asambodo maka mmuta ọrụ ndụzi na azụmahia na Cranfield University School of Management
Abulokwe bu onye okike ihe ọhụrụ teknuzu, onye ochụnta ego banyere ọrụ nchịkwa dijitalụ na onye isi oche
O nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na ise na ahụmịhe na ọrụ oyibo
Ọ bụ onye guzọbere na onye isi, MicroMax Consulting
Na 2013, o sonyere na kọmitii/ndị isi oche nke Sopra Steria dị ka onye isi oche ha
N’afọ 2017, Nneka ghọrọ onye isi oche, Board Nomination Committee Information Systems Audit and Control Association (ISACA)
Dika onye isi oche nke ndi otu ahụ, o webatara usoro nhoputa ndi oru site na oru ndi ochichi
Ọ kwalitere ndị-iche na itinye oganihu n'etiti njikwa nke nzukọ a
Na 2020 a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi, Mahadum Cambridge.
Na 2019, a kwanyere ya ugwu dị ka onye isi nke Order of the British Empire site n'aka onye isi mba Britain; Queen Elizabeth II maka ọrụ Azụmaahịa ya
Na 2018, a họọrọ ya onye nke anọ na Financial Times Top 100 Black Asian Minority Ethnic (BAME) Tech Leaders
Ọ sokwa na ndepụta ikpeazụ nke Governance Professional of the Year 2018 Award site n'aka Governance Institute
Na 2019, e gosipụtara Abulokwe na Power-list 100 dịka otu n'ime ndị isi ahịa azụmaahịa di ojii kachasị emetụta ọha, tinyekwa ya n'etiti ndị isi ojii 100 kachasị nwee mmetụta na UK
Edepụtara Abulokwe n'ime mmadụ 100 kachasị si Afrika na Caribbean nke dị na UK
